advancedsearch-options-pane-head: Label for the introduction of advanced search. It is used both as a header for the expanded pane and as a label for the following options when the pane is collapsed.
advancedsearch-options-pane-preview-list: Title used for the list of previewed search terms in the collapsed pane.
advancedsearch-optgroup-text: Label for the option group that contains search fields that refer to page content
advancedsearch-optgroup-structure:
Label for the option group that contains search fields that are specialized and/or more structural like templates, subpages and categories
{{Identical|Structure}}
advancedsearch-optgroup-files: Label for the option group that contains search fields for file type and properties
advancedsearch-optgroup-sort: Label for the option group that contains search fields for sorting search results
advancedsearch-field-plain: Label for the field for plain search.
advancedsearch-field-phrase: Label for the field for exact search.
advancedsearch-field-or: Label for the field for ''or'' search.
advancedsearch-field-not: Label for the field for excluded words in search
advancedsearch-field-subpageof: Label for the field for searching in subpages
advancedsearch-field-intitle: Label for the field for searching in title
advancedsearch-field-deepcategory: Label for the field for searching in category
advancedsearch-field-hastemplate: Label for the field for searching pages with a template
advancedsearch-field-inlanguage: Label for the field for pages in a specific language
advancedsearch-field-filetype:
Label for the field for file type
{{Identical|File type}}
advancedsearch-field-filew: Label for the field for file width in pixels
advancedsearch-field-fileh: Label for the field for file height in pixels
advancedsearch-field-preview-sort:
Label for the sorting order field in the list of preview pills.

Parameters:
* $1 - The specific type of sorting. Can be, for example, {{msg-mw|advancedsearch-sort-preview-relevance}}, {{msg-mw|advancedsearch-sort-preview-last-edit-desc}}, {{msg-mw|advancedsearch-sort-preview-create-timestamp-desc}}, and more.
advancedsearch-help-general-instruction:
Informs the user that clicking on the button will display popup instructions on how to use the search field or dropdown list.

Parameters:
* $1 - Name of the field, e.g. {{msg-mw|advancedsearch-field-plain}}, {{msg-mw|advancedsearch-field-deepcategory}}, and many more.
advancedsearch-help-plain: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for plain search
advancedsearch-help-phrase: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for exact search
advancedsearch-help-or: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for or search
advancedsearch-help-not: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for excluded words in search
advancedsearch-help-intitle: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for searching pages with titles that contain this word
advancedsearch-help-subpageof: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for searching pages with titles that are a subpage of this page
advancedsearch-help-deepcategory: Help text shown in a dialog for the field that restricts search to pages in a category and its child categories
advancedsearch-help-hastemplate: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for searching pages with a template
advancedsearch-help-inlanguage: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for searching pages in a certain language
advancedsearch-help-filetype: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for file type
advancedsearch-help-filew: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for file width in pixels
advancedsearch-help-fileh: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for file height in pixels
advancedsearch-help-sort: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for sorting order
advancedsearch-placeholder-exact-text:
Placeholder that is shown for the field exact words.
'''Do NOT alter the quotation marks style.'''
advancedsearch-filetype-section-types: Label for the file type section
advancedsearch-filetype-section-image: Label for the image format section
advancedsearch-filetype-section-video: Label for the video format section
advancedsearch-filetype-section-audio: Label for the audio Format section
advancedsearch-filetype-section-document: Label for the document format section
advancedsearch-filetype-section-other: Label for the other formats section
advancedsearch-filesize-equals: Label for the file width/height 'equals' comparator selection
advancedsearch-filesize-greater-than: Label for the file width/height 'greater than' comparator selection
advancedsearch-filesize-smaller-than: Label for the file width/height 'smaller than' comparator selection
advancedsearch-sort-relevance: Dropdown label for sort option relevance
advancedsearch-sort-last-edit-asc: Dropdown label for sort option least to most recently edited
advancedsearch-sort-last-edit-desc: Dropdown label for sort option most to least recently edited
advancedsearch-sort-create-timestamp-asc: Dropdown label for sort option least to most recently created
advancedsearch-sort-create-timestamp-des: Dropdown label for sort option most to least recently created
advancedsearch-sort-preview-relevance: Preview label for sort option relevance. Used as $1 in {{msg-mw|advancedsearch-field-preview-sort}}.
advancedsearch-sort-preview-last-edit-as: Preview label for sort option least to most recently edited
advancedsearch-sort-preview-last-edit-de: Preview label for sort option most to least recently edited. Used as $1 in {{msg-mw|advancedsearch-field-preview-sort}}.
advancedsearch-sort-preview-create-times: Preview label for sort option least to most recently created
Preview label for sort option most to least recently created. Used as $1 in {{msg-mw|advancedsearch-field-preview-sort}}.
advancedsearch-namespaces-search-in: Label for the 'Search in' section heading of the namespace section
advancedsearch-namespaces-remember: Label for a checkbox to save namespace choice for advanced search to user preferences
advancedsearch-namespaces-pane-preview-l: Title used for the list of previewed namespace filters in the collapsed pane.
advancedsearch-namespaces-preset-all:
Label for the namespace preset 'All namespaces'
{{Identical|All}}
advancedsearch-namespaces-placeholder: Placeholder text shown in the namespace selection field
prefs-advancedsearch: Section name for advanced search settings in the user preferences.
advancedsearch-preference-help: Help text explaining the AdvancedSearch interface for the user preference that disables the interface
advancedsearch-preference-disable: Label for the user preference that disables the AdvancedSearch interface
